description: Looking for an easy chicken recipe? With just four steps and five ingredients, you'll be enjoying this garlicky chicken with mash in just 20 minutes.
keywords: Speedy Chilli, Garlic & Rosemary Chicken with Mash & Beans
name: Speedy Chilli, Garlic & Rosemary Chicken with Mash & Beans Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g Woolworths COOK chilli, garlic & rosemary chicken breast steaks

recipeInstructions.text: Divide mash, chicken and beans among plates. Spoon gravy over chicken and serve.
